rules_text:
When Wistful Moonchild enters the battlefield, create a 1/0 colorless Spirit creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]No light is ever lost; simply, reformed.[/i]
